titles.title: To authorize salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for fiscal year 2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 12/7/2005--Introduced. Authorizes cost of living salary adjustments for Justices of the U.S. Supreme Court and other federal judges for FY2006.
